short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple currency exchange extension (including XOF & BitCoin)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to convert a large number of different currencies.

You can open the popup of the extension to make your conversion, or you can select an amount on the page you are currently visiting and convert it via the extension without leaving the page.

2 shortcuts are available for a quick opening: 

Windows: Ctrl+Shift+F
Mac : MacCtrl+Shift+F 

The up-to-date conversions rates are provided by https://api.exchangerate.host
